games.title: Precision Tap
games.description: Reflex-based tapping game. Click targets as fast as you can! Smaller targets give more points, and combos multiply your score. You have 30 seconds.

games.title: Word Scramble
games.description: Unscramble tech-related words as fast as you can! Features hints, scoring system, and 60-second timer.

games.title: Simon Says
games.description: Classic memory game! Watch the color sequence, then repeat it. How far can you go?
